Title: Chivas 1-2-3
Description:
["Ruthless sorcerer Chivas Scotch is hired by a count named Cuttlefish to destroy an evil monster attacking a nearby village. But things go awry when Chivas fails to destroy the monster and he's forced to transfer his spirit in the body of his beautiful servant Gin Fizz. ", '
', '
', '
', '
(Source: ANN)']
Voices: ['Yao, Kazuki', 'Imai, Yuka', 'Houki, Katsuhisa', 'Kosugi, Juurouta', 'Kosugi, Juurouta', 'Takimoto, Fujiko', 'Canna, Nobutoshi', 'Nishimura, Chinami']
Staff: [['Watanabe, Jun', 'Sound Director'], ['Kawasaki, Hiroyuki', 'Script'], ['Abe, Hisashi', 'Animation Director, Character Design'], ['Katou, Yasutada', 'Art Director']]
